name: SmartMath
0:
”Alexa open Smart Math”
”Alexa ask Smart Math for a fact”
”Alexa tell Smart Math to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart math
des:
Ask for Math Facts, and learn random math calculations.

Smart Math provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Smart Math" or "Alexa, open Smart Math" to get a fact.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
